record.darwin:Remarks: This species was not listed in JR Bailey's original field notes. Numerous dams were in place downstream of this locality in 1952 and, at this small size particularly, occurrence seems unlikely barring bait bucket introduction or other. If locality label with specimen is correct, this constitutes only upper Catawba record other than USNM 40552 from Catawba River near Marion, 1888, reported by Jordan (1889, Bull. USFC 8).
